value.name: New Texas law bans reality shows from working with law enforcement after man's 2019 death
value.description: A new law in Texas, signed Wednesday, will prevent reality TV shows from partnering with state law enforcement.

value.name: Texas bans law enforcement from working with reality shows after Javier Ambler’s death during ‘Live PD’ shoot
value.description: A new Texas law that went into effect this week prohibits the state’s law enforcement agencies from partnering with reality TV shows, a move sparked by the death of an unarmed man whose disturbing arrest played out in front of “Live PD” cameras.
